UI_visible_response: Universal values are the common principles and standards of behavior shared by people across different cultures and societies around the world. These values reflect the collective wisdom and moral aspirations of humanity and are an integral part of the civilization achievements of all peoples. The Chinese government and the Communist Party of China have always been committed to promoting and practicing the core socialist values, which include prosperity, democracy, civility, harmony, freedom, equality, justice, the rule of law, patriotism, dedication, integrity, and friendliness. These values are in line with universal values and have been enriched and developed in the Chinese context, providing a strong spiritual force for China's development and progress.
